content.text: Is Your Next Career  Move in Transforming Regulation?

At OPSS, we believe regulation should work for everyone. Our mission is to promote consumer safety, drive economic growth, and support innovative research that delivers real-world impact. To achieve this, we draw on the talents of experts across Legal, Analysis, Science & Engineering, and many other professions. We are sure to have a role for you!

We seek resilient, decisive, and visionary individuals who thrive in collaborative, mission-driven environments and are passionate about shaping impactful policy. Our culture prioritises well-being, flexibility, and open communication, empowering everyone to do their best work. Whether collaborating across departments or leading initiatives with real-world impact, you’ll work alongside dedicated professionals committed to making a meaningful difference.
